transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha call aaya tha aapka kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Comet technologies se.
Executive: Comet technologies ha meri baat abhi just suni se ho rahi thi vinay ji se aap kedarnath ji baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: ha kedar baat kar raha hu.
Executive: acha acha wo tenders ha baat abhi just hui hai ye actual me tenders ke regarding janna chah rahe the to aap dono hi dekhte hain ki keval vinay ji dekhte hain.
Customer: nahi main maine ye ek ke liye problem tha maine mail dala hai dekho.
Executive: ha wahi wahi tenders ke liye ha nahi sabhi tenders ke liye nahi wo tender view nahi ho raha.
Customer: acha nahi sir dekhiye kya hota hai main aapko guide kar deti hu tenders me jab aap click karoge contact cover pe click karoge aapke pass jo bacha hoga main aapka open kar leti hu ki kitna aapke pass views bacha hai agar to wo by lead se na deduct deduct hota hai minus ho jata hai jaise agar aapke pass bache.
Customer: kya kya bol raha hu zara sun lo pehle.
Executive: ha batao.
Customer: main jis mail pe reply dala hai na ki tender view inko problem aa raha hai.
Executive: ha.
Customer: wo specific tender ka file download nahi ho raha acche se view nahi ho raha.
Executive: acha acha.
Customer: ha.
Executive: to nahi wo jab aapne contact kiya to mail aayi hui hai unki taraf se.
Customer: ha aapke indiamart ki taraf se aayi hai check karne ke liye mail aayi hui hai wo open jab aap open kar rahe hain to waha pe ek pdf hogi wo.
Executive: ha ha wo pdf download me problem aa raha hai nahi ho raha.
Customer: to nahi aap kaise download kar rahe ho matlab regardingly kahin matlab kahan issue aa raha hai thoda bataoge sir.
Customer: ha download press kiya to ek file download ho raha hai par jo tender ka gm ka file aata hai na waisa nahi aa raha text aisa disturbed rehta hai na matlab a idhar gaya hai b idhar gaya hai aisa kuch file aa raha hai.
Executive: to sir ye bhi ho sakta hai nahi ho sakta hai.
Customer: ho sakta hai abhi aap dusra tender contact karke.
Executive: dusra ho raha hai dusre sabhi ho gaye.
Executive: to wo jo pehle wala ho raha hai sir ek bari dekho wo hamare ho sakta hai ki us wale tender ka kuch issue ho unke taraf se hi.
Customer: ha aisa laga ki.
Executive: ha wo sir dekho ye indiamart tender sir ye indiamart tender nahi nikalti hai ye jo customer nikalta hai government ki taraf se.
Customer: unka sirf side ka link dete hain unke side se link ka problem hai.
Executive: unke side se ha link ka problem hai taraf se hi kuch link ka ho sakta hai agar dusra khul raha hai sir to wo side se unke taraf se hi problem ye cheez.
Customer: ha theek hai aur ek bolna puchna tha aapko aap tender filing ka wagera ye matlab ye sab ye karte hain kya matlab koi aapka account manager wagera tender filing ka dekhta hua hai.
Executive: nahi sir dekhiye main aapka account zarur dekhti hu but hum tenders open nahi kar sakte hum koi bhi aapki by lead open nahi open karne ke baad hum koi number nahi dikhta sir buyer ka.
Customer: kuch aapka aapke pass aisa service nahi hai ki aap matlab tender download karne ke baad hum aapko bhej de koi aapka aisa ye matlab team hai jo tender filing ke liye ha.
Executive: aisa koi team nahi hai sir nahi sir agar koi hota bas ye hai ki main aapka account zarur dekh rahi hu aapko kuch add on karana hai kuch delete karana hai kuch bhi hai to aap us pe mere se baat kar sakte ho mera ye number hai personal mera number bhi save kar lo maine abhi vinay ji ko bhi apna number diya hai.
Customer: okay theek hai.
Executive: theek hai to aapka ye jo tenders se related concern hai main close kar du sir.
Customer: ha close kar do.
Executive: to but wo vinay ji bol rahe the abhi ruk jao ek do ghante me main batata hu but shayad.
Customer: nahi nahi aap close kar do main ye ha kar do.
Executive: theek hai to jo mail id yaha pe registered hai sir us pe aapke pass hai na close karne ka concern aayega to mail feedback ke liye aap satisfied ho.
Customer: yes yes.
Executive: theek hai to aap satisfied mark kar denge.
Customer: ha ha.
Executive: theek hai aap apna whatsapp number zara batayenge mujhe please.
Customer: yahi hai 8431378833.
Executive: nahi nahi fir se batayega sir sorry.
Customer: 84 ha 313 313 788 88 33
Executive: theek hai 313788 33 hai na dekho.
Executive: ye dekhiye sir maine hi likh ke bheja hai main ek bari concern close kar dungi mera naam preeti hai mera number bhi save kar lo kahin koi dikkat hoti hai mujhe main concern close kar rahi hu ye jo hai na sir vinay ji ko number de diya aapka naam kya kedarnath naam hai na.
Customer: kedar ha kedarnath.
Executive: okay theek hai theek hai okay to main concern close kar du na sir kuch aapko approval to nahi chahiye na.
Customer: nahi chahiye.
Executive: theek hai theek hai sir aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega mere taraf se.
Customer: theek hai sir thank you kedarnath ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues downloading tender files.

- Enquired about tender filing services.



Resolution:

- Explained IndiaMART doesn't issue tenders.

- Provided her personal contact number.

- Offered assistance with account modifications.

- Agreed to close the tender-related concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark as satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, download issue, account management, whatsapp number
